snippet: Doctors have found that one of the two 12-year-old girls accused of stabbing a classmate to please a fictional online horror character, Slender Man, is mentally incompetent to stand trial.
abstract: Doctors in Wisconsin have found that one of the two 12-year-old girls accused of stabbing a classmate to please a fictional online horror character, Slender Man, is mentally incompetent to stand trial; lawyer for second girl says he believes mental competency also will be an issue in her case.
lead_paragraph: Doctors have found that one of the two 12-year-old girls accused of stabbing a classmate to please a fictional online horror character, Slender Man, is mentally incompetent to stand trial.

headline.main: Wisconsin: Doctors Question Competency of Girl Accused of Stabbing Classmate
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin: Doctors Question Competency of Girl Accused in Stabbing of Classmate
